data.name: GeneralTab_BlockedMessages
data.value: Tidy Chat hat bisher {0:n0} Nachrichten blockiert.

data.name: GeneralTab_BlockCountHelpMarker
data.value: Wird nur alle 100 blockierten Nachrichten, beim Gebietswechsel, oder beim Ausloggen aktualisiert.

data.name: GeneralTab_FilterProgressSpamHelpMarker
data.value: Diese Filter beinhalten z.B. erhaltene Errungenschaften oder Routine

data.name: GeneralTab_FilterLootSpamHelpMarker
data.value: Dieser Filter beinhaltet Nachrichten wie Würfelergebnisse oder den Erhalt von Beutegut

data.name: GeneralTab_FilterObtainedSpamHelpMarker
data.value: Dieser Filter beinhaltet Nachrichten beim Erhalt von Gegenständen von Monstern, Quests, und Zufallsinhalten

data.name: GeneralTab_FilterCraftingSpamHelpMarker
data.value: Dieser Filter beinhaltet alle Synthese-Nachrichten außer "Du stellst ein <item>" her Dies erlaubt es dir, Benachrichtigungen mit ChatAlerts für "Du stellst ein" statt in Makros zu benutzen

data.name: GeneralTab_FilterGatheringSpamHelpMarker
data.value: Dieser Filter beinhaltet "Du beginnst/bist fertig mit", sowie Nachrichten zu Sammelstelleneffekten

data.name: GeneralTab_EmoteFiltersHeaderDropdown
data.comment: The clickable dropdown header for Emote filters

data.name: GeneralTab_TidyChatTagHelpMarker
data.value: Stellt Nachrichten, die von Tidy Chat gesendet oder modifiziert wurden, [TidyChat] voran

data.name: GeneralTab_ImprovedInstanceMessagingHelpMarker
data.value: Ändert den Instanzentext zu: Du bist jetzt in Instanz: #

data.name: GeneralTab_ImprovedPlayerCommendationsHelpMarker
data.value: Deaktiviert die Systemnachricht für erhaltene Ehrungen und ersetzt sie durch eine einzelne Nachricht in deinem Dalamud Chat-Kanal (siehe "Allgemein" Einstellungen in Dalamud - standardmäßig ist dies Debug)

data.name: GeneralTab_ImprovedCommendationsDutyName
data.value: Füge den abgeschlossenen Inhalt der Nachricht zu "Wertvollster Spieler"-Ehrungen hinzu

data.name: GeneralTab_ImprovedSayMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: Wenn du für einen Auftrag etwas /sagen musst wird die Nachricht so angepasst, dass sie leicht kopiert und eingefügt werden kann

data.name: GeneralTab_CopySayMessage
data.value: Verbesserte /sagen Nachrichten automatisch in die Zwischenablage kopieren

data.name: GeneralTab_ImprovedNoviceNetworkMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: Reduziert die Textmenge beim Beitritt zum Neulings-Chat und vereinheitlicht die Nachricht beim Verlassen.

data.name: GeneralTab_FilterEmotesHelpMarker
data.value: Blockiert alle Emotes, an denen du nicht beteiligt bist.

data.name: GeneralTab_FilterCustomEmotesHelpMarker
data.value: Blockiert alle "/em" Nachrichten, die nicht von dir stammen oder dich erwähnen. z.B. Anderer Spieler lehnt sich zu dir rüber und knuddelt dich ganz doll.

data.name: GeneralTab_FilterSelfEmotesHelpMarker
data.value: Blockiert Nachrichten von deinen (persönlichen) Emotes. z.B. Du streichelst <user> sanft.

data.name: SystemTab_ExperimentalFeatureInverseModeHelpMarker
data.value: Blockiert Systemnachrichten nicht mehr standardmäßig. "Blockieren"-Filter werden zu "Anzeigen"-Filtern, und umgekehrt.

data.name: SystemTab_ExperimentalFeatureInverseModeWarningText
data.value: Wenn du den umgekehrten Modus aktivierst, bist du auf dich allein gestellt und wirst keinen Support erhalten. Es wird davon ausgegangen, dass du weißt, was du tust.

data.name: SystemTab_HideShownDefaultDropdownHeader
data.value: Systemnachrichten blockieren, die Tidy Chat standardmäßig anzeigt

data.name: SystemTab_HideInstanceMessageHelpMarker
data.value: z.B. Du bist nun in dem instanziierten Areal „Thavnair “. Mit dem Textbefehl /instanz kannst du jederzeit einsehen, ob dein Areal gerade instanziiert ist.

data.name: SystemTab_HideSRankSpawnAnnouncement
data.value: Benachrichtigung über Rang S Elite-Ziele blockieren

data.name: SystemTab_HideSRankSpawnAnnouncementHelpMarker
data.value: z.B. Du spürst ein sehr starkes Hochwild ...

data.name: SystemTab_HideSSRankMinionSpawnAnnouncementHelpMarker
data.value: eg. The minions of an extraordinarily powerful mark are on the hunt for prey... The minions of an extraordinarily powerful mark have withdrawn...

data.name: SystemTab_HideReceivedCommendationsHelpMarker
data.value: eg. You received a player commendation!

data.name: SystemTab_HideCompletedVentureHelpMarker
data.value: eg. RetainerName has completed a venture!

data.name: SystemTab_HideSayReminder
data.value: Erinnerungen während Aufträgen etwas zu /sagen blockieren.

data.name: SystemTab_HideSayReminderHelpMarker
data.value: eg. With the chat mode in Say, enter a phrase containing “Tataru” at the destination point.

data.name: SystemTab_HideYouSenseSomethingMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. You sense something to the far, far southwest...

data.name: SystemTab_HideAetherCompassMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. The compass detects a current approximately 143 yalms to the West...

data.name: SystemTab_HideItemSearchResultsMessageHelpMarker
data.value: eg. 1 item found in the 4th tab of your inventory.

data.name: SystemTab_HideAirshipVoyageMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. A new exploratory voyage destination...has been discovered!

data.name: SystemTab_HideSubmarineVoyageMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. A new subaquatic voyage destination...has been discovered!

data.name: SystemTab_HideVistaMessages
data.value: Hide vista arrival and stray messages

data.name: SystemTab_HideVistaMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. You have arrived at a vista! and You have strayed too far from the vista.

data.name: SystemTab_ShowHiddenMessagesDropdownHeader
data.value: Show System messages Tidy Chat hides by default

data.name: SystemTab_ShowOnlineStatusMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. Updating online status to Away from Keyboard.

data.name: SystemTab_ShowMailAttachmentMessages
data.value: Show items attached to sent mail

data.name: SystemTab_ShowMailAttachmentMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. You attach 2 pots of Dalamud Red Dye to the letter.

data.name: SystemTab_ShowARRRelicProgressMessages
data.value: Show ARR Relic book step progress messages

data.name: SystemTab_ShowARRRelicProgressMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. Record of Ouranos kill (1/1) added for <Relic Weapon> - Strength +2.

data.name: SystemTab_ShowARRRelicBookStepMessages
data.value: Show ARR Relic book step completed messages

data.name: SystemTab_ShowARRRelicBookStepMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. All objectives under the category Dungeons for <Relic Weapon> - Strength +2 complete!

data.name: SystemTab_ShowCompletionTimeForUnrestrictedParty
data.value: Show completion time when unrestricted party is active

data.name: SystemTab_ShowVolumeControlMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. Master Volume muted, BGM volume set to 50.

data.name: SystemTab_ShowGlamourPlateChangingMessages
data.value: Show message when changing glamour plates

data.name: SystemTab_ShowObtainedPomanderMessages
data.value: Show when the party obtains a pomander

data.name: SystemTab_ShowReturnedPomanderMessages
data.value: Show when you return a pomander to the coffer

data.name: SystemTab_ShowCairnOfPassageGlowsMessages
data.value: Show when the Cairn of Passage begins to glow

data.name: SystemTab_ShowCairnOfReturnUsedMessages
data.value: Show when Cairn of Return is used

data.name: SystemTab_ShowCairnOfPassageActivatedMessages
data.value: Show when the Cairn of Passage is activated

data.name: SystemTab_ShowPomanderOfSafetyUsedMessages
data.value: Show when Pomander of Safety is used

data.name: SystemTab_ShowPomanderOfSightUsedMessages
data.value: Show when Pomander of Sight is used

data.name: SystemTab_ShowPomanderOfAffluenceUsedMessages
data.value: Show when Pomander of Affluence is used

data.name: SystemTab_ShowPomanderOfFlightUsedMessages
data.value: Show when Pomander of Flight is used

data.name: SystemTab_ShowPomanderOfAlterationUsedMessages
data.value: Show when Pomander of Alteration is used

data.name: SystemTab_ShowPomanderOfWitchingUsedMessages
data.value: Show when Pomander of Witching is used

data.name: SystemTab_ShowPomanderOfSerenityUsedMessages
data.value: Show when Pomander of Serenity is used

data.name: SystemTab_ShowFloorNumberMessages
data.value: Show floor number when entering a new floor

data.name: SystemTab_ShowAccursedHoardSensedMessages
data.value: Show when Accursed Hoard is sensed

data.name: SystemTab_ShowAccursedHoardNotSensedMessages
data.value: Show when Accursed Hoard is not sensed on the current floor

data.name: SystemTab_ShowAccursedHoardDiscoveredMessages
data.value: Show when Accursed Hoard is discovered

data.name: SystemTab_ShowTeleportOfferFromPartyMessages
data.value: Show teleport offers from party members

data.name: ObtainTab_CastYourLotHelpMarker
data.value: This will show the message that occurs when you roll on loot. eg. You cast your lot for the <item>

data.name: ObtainTab_ShowYouRolledMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: This will show the message that occurs after everyone has rolled on loot and you are given the result of your roll. eg. You roll Need/Greed on the <item>. 63!

data.name: ObtainTab_ShowAnotherPlayerCastsLotMessages
data.value: Show "Another Player casts his/her lot <item>" messages

data.name: ObtainTab_ShowAnotherPlayerCastsLotMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: This will show the message that occurs when another player in the party rolls for a loot drop. eg. Some player casts her lot for <item>.

data.name: ObtainTab_ShowAnotherPlayerObtainsItemMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: This will show the message that occurs when another player in the party obtains a loot drop. eg. Some player obtains an <item>!

data.name: ObtainTab_ShowPoeticsMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. You obtain 100 Allagan tomestones of Poetics.

data.name: ObtainTab_ShowAphorismMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. You obtain 60 Allagan tomestones of Aphorism.

data.name: ObtainTab_ShowAstronomyMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. You obtain 20 Allagan tomestones of Astronomy.

data.name: ObtainTab_ShowSacksOfNutsMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. You obtain 100 sacks of Nuts.

data.name: ObtainTab_ShowBeastTribeCraftingMaterialsMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: This will show the message that occurs when you receive crafting materials to be used in Beast Tribe crafting quests. eg. You obtain Starboard Hull Component Materials

data.name: ObtainTab_ShowBeastTribeCurrenciesMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: This will show the message that occurs when you receive Beast Tribe currencies upon completion of a Beast Tribe quest.

data.name: ObtainTab_ShowCrackedClustersMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: This will show cracked clusters such as Dendroclusters and Anthoclusters. For hiding elemental clusters see the hide elemental clusters option down below. eg. You obtain a cracked dendrocluster

data.name: ObtainTab_ShowElementalShardsCrystalsClustersMessages
data.value: Show elemental shards, crystals, and clusters

data.name: ObtainTab_ShowElementalShardsCrystalsClustersMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: This will show the message that occurs when you gather or receive elemental shards, crystals, or clusters eg. You obtain 30 ice shards

data.name: ChatHistoryTab_EnableChatHistoryFilterHelpMarker
data.value: If a message was sent within the last {0} messages it will be filtered

data.name: ChatHistoryTab_IgnoreMessagesSentByPlayerHelpMarker
data.value: Filters duplicate messages sent by the player, enable if you want duplicate messages you sent to be filtered from your view.

data.name: ChatHistoryTab_LengthOfChatHistory
data.value: Number of messages to keep in chat history

data.name: ChatHistoryTab_LengthOfChatHistoryWarningMessage
data.value: WARNING: Having the history length set too high may impact game performance. It's recommended to keep it at 50 or lower.

data.name: ChatHistoryTab_ChatHistoryTimer
data.value: Number of seconds to keep messages in chat history

data.name: CraftingGatheringTab_ShowMateriaSuccesfullyAttachedMessages
data.value: Show message when materia is succesfully attached to gear

data.name: CraftingGatheringTab_ShowMateriaOvermeldFailuresMessages
data.value: Show message when materia fails to be overmelded onto gear

data.name: CraftingGatheringTab_ShowSuccesfullyRetrievedMateriaMessages
data.value: Show message when you succesfully retrieve materia from gear

data.name: CraftingGatheringTab_ShowMateriaShattersMessages
data.value: Show message when materia shatters during retrieval

data.name: CraftingGatheringTab_ShowMateriaExtractedMessages
data.value: Show message when materia is extracted from spiritbonded gear

data.name: CraftingGatheringTab_ShowTrialSynthesisMessages
data.value: Show final status messages upon finishing a Trial synthesis

data.name: CraftingGatheringTab_ShowOtherPlayerCompletedSynthesisMessages
data.value: Show synthesis message when other players complete a craft.

data.name: CraftingGatheringTab_ShowObtainedSandsFromAetherialReductionMessages
data.value: Show the number of obtained sands after using aetherial reduction

data.name: CraftingGatheringTab_ShowLocationGatheringEffectMessages
data.value: Show message when location affects gathering yield, receiving Gatherer's Boon, or gathering attempts

data.name: CraftingGatheringTab_HideGatheringYieldLocationMessages
data.value: Hide only locations that affect gathering yield

data.name: CraftingGatheringTab_HideGatheringAttemptsLocationMessages
data.value: Hide only locations that affect gathering attempts

data.name: CraftingGatheringTab_HideGatheringBoonLocationMessages
data.value: Hide only locations that affect Gatherer's Boon

data.name: CraftingGatheringTab_ShowFishAddedToGuideMessages
data.value: Show message when a fish is added to the fish guide

data.name: ProgressTab_ShowBonusAwardForDutyRouletteMessages
data.value: Show bonus award for using duty roulette

data.name: ProgressTab_ShowBonusAwardForDutyRouletteMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. A bonus of 4,252,498 experience points and 12,000 gil has been awarded for using the duty roulette.

data.name: ProgressTab_ShowAdventurerInNeedAwardMessages
data.value: Show bonus awarded for being an adventurer in need

data.name: ProgressTab_ShowAdventurerInNeedAwardMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: eg. A bonus of 7,200 gil has been awarded for being an adventurer in need.

data.name: ProgressTab_ShowOtherPlayersEarnedAchievementMessages
data.value: Show other player's earned achievement messages

data.name: ProgressTab_ShowLevelUpMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: This will show the message that occurs when you level up. It can be considered spammy in Palace of the Dead and Heaven On High.

data.name: ProgressTab_ShowOtherPlayersLevelUpMessages
data.value: Show other player's level up messages

data.name: ProgressTab_ShowOtherPlayerLevelUpMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: This will show the message that occurs when others level up. eg. Player attains level 33!

data.name: ProgressTab_ShowLearnedAbilityMessagesHelpMarker
data.value: This will show the message that occurs when you learn a new ability. It can be considered spammy in Palace of the Dead and Heaven On High.

data.name: WhitelistTab_ShowAllMessagesByWhitelistedPlayer
data.value: Show all messages sent by whitelisted player

data.name: WhitelistTab_ShowAllMessagesTargetingWhitelistedPlayer
data.value: Show all messages targeting a whitelisted player

data.name: WhitelistTab_ExplanationMessage
data.value: Users added to the whitelist will be treated as if they were you for all filter settings. Enter a player's first and last name and then press <Enter> to add them to the whitelist.

data.name: WhitelistTab_ExactNameMatchWhitelistExplanation
data.value:
You must enter the player's name as it would be seen in chat - including any periods.
eg. Surname Abbreviated: Example N. Forename Abbreviated: E. Name Initials: E. N.

data.name: ChatHistoryTab_SelectChannels
data.value: Select channels for Chat History to filter:

data.name: ChatHistoryTab_SystemChannel
data.comment: This should be the name of the System channel for messages

data.name: TidyChat_TippyTips1
data.value: Is Tidy Chat blocking a message you want to see? Add the message to Tidy Chat's whitelist as a name! Yes - that really works!

data.name: TidyChat_TippyTips2
data.value: Did you know? Tidy Chat has a chat history feature to block repetitive messages.

data.name: TidyChat_TippyTips3
data.value: Tidy Chat blocks all system messages by default. You can enable Inverse Mode to block specific System messages instead.

data.name: TidyChat_TippyTips4
data.value: Tidy Chat has many useful settings that must first be enabled.

data.name: TidyChat_TippyTips6
data.value: Try to say Tidy Chat ten times fast... Good try, now please stop saying Thai Chat.

data.name: TidyChat_TippyTipsOverOneMillion
data.value: Tidy Chat has blocked over 1,000,000 messages so far!

data.name: TidyChat_TippyTipsOverFiveHundredThousand
data.value: Tidy Chat has blocked over 500,000 messages so far!

data.name: TidyChat_TippyTipsOverOneHundredThousand
data.value: Tidy Chat has blocked over 100,000 messages so far!

data.name: TidyChat_TippyTipsOverFiftyThousand
data.value: Tidy Chat has blocked over 50,000 messages so far!

data.name: TidyChat_TippyTipsOverTenThousand
data.value: Tidy Chat has blocked over 10,000 messages so far!

data.name: TidyChat_TippyTipsOverFiveThousand
data.value: Tidy Chat has blocked over 5,000 messages so far!

data.name: TidyChat_TippyTipsOverOneThousand
data.value: Tidy Chat has blocked over 1,000 messages so far!

data.name: TidyChat_TippyTipsOverOneHundred
data.value: Tidy Chat has blocked over 100 messages so far!

data.name: TidyChat_TippyIpcToEnable
data.value: To enable Tippy Tips for Tidy Chat you must first install Tippy.

data.name: TidyChat_TippyIpcMessagesDancingThancred
data.value: You earned 0 commendations from dancing thancred was pretty pleasant when i ended up kugane o.

data.name: TidyChat_TippyIpcMessagesZeroCommendations
data.value: And here is where I'd tell you how many commendations you received... if you had received any.

data.name: TidyChat_TippyIpcMessagesPopularCommendations
data.value: It looks like people like you!
